asset.name: Check Promotion Document
asset.description: No Document is defined. Please add it to the promotion.

asset_feature.value_string: exists(index-of(for $x in ((cs:child-rel()[@key='user.*']/cs:asset()[@censhare:asset.type='document.' and @censhare:storage_item.mimetype='application/pdf'])/asset_feature[@feature='msp:alz.media.name']/@value_string) return (matches($x, '^F_.+', 'i') or matches($x, '.*_print$', 'i')), true()))
